channel.title: Rendering on 玄冬Wong
channel.description: Recent content in Rendering on 玄冬Wong

item.title: [OpenGL]Rendering Pipeline(渲染管线)流程概述
item.description: Pipeline (The blue boxes are programmable shader stages.) The OpenGL rendering pipeline works in the following order: Prepare vertex array data, and then render it Vertex Processing: Each vertex is acted upon by a Vertex Shader. Each vertex in the stream is processed in turn into an output vertex. Optional primitive tessellation stages. Optional Geometry Shader primitive processing. The output is a sequence of primitives.
